module, individual, activity, action, process, process plant
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record the existence of a individual activity.
An individual activity is a period in the life of one or more physical individuals, such that one or more of the physical individuals are changed during the period.
Membership of a class of activity may indicate the nature of an individual activity.
The act of changing the lubricating oil for pump p_101 on 2001-10-09 is an individual_activity.
This individual of activity is a member of the class_of_activity 'change lubricating oil'.
the existence of a individual activity.
class of activity; Class of activity is within the scope of the Class_of_activityClass of activity application module.
membership of a class of activity; Membership of a class of activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.
relationships between individual activities; Relationships between individual activities are within the scopes of the Composition_of_individual_activity and Connection_of_individual_activity application modules.
involvement of things in an individual activity. The involvement of things in an individual activity is within the scopes of the Individual_involvement_in_activity application module.
The Individual_activity UoF identifies an individual of activity, action or process.
